name: FoodInsecurityScreeningAssessmentsAndQuestions
title: Food Insecurity Screening Assessments And Questions
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values represents screening assessments and questions for Food Insecurity as selected by the Gravity Project.),(Data Element Scope: This set of values may be used to represent screening assessments or questions in observations, questionnaires, and questionnaire responses for this SDOH domain (e.g., for the SDOHCC Observation Screening Response profile in the Gravity SDOH Clinical Care FHIR Implementation Guide).),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for SDOH screening assessments and questions as selected by the Gravity Project.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes the questions not selected by the Gravity Project from SDOH screening assessments.)

contains.display: Hunger Vital Sign [HVS]
Within the past 12 months we worried whether our food would run out before we got money to buy more [U.S. FSS]
Within the past 12 months the food we bought just didn't last and we didn't have money to get more [U.S. FSS]
